rows.label: qst640502_msg0001
rows.name:
This looks simple enough!
Here, let me read it for you.

rows.label: qst640502_msg0003
rows.name:
In the interests of safety...
Launch code... Divided into two...

rows.label: qst640502_msg0007
rows.name:
The data is really fragmented, so
I can't really get much more from
this, but sounds interesting, eh?

rows.label: qst640502_msg0009
rows.name:
Ah, you never get excited about
anything, KOS-MOS Re:...

rows.label: qst640502_msg0010
rows.name:
Are you sure there's not some
part of you, deep down inside,
that's dying to know more?

rows.label: qst640502_msg0011
rows.name:
You're not even a tiny bit curious
to know what would happen if we
got our hands on those codes?

rows.label: qst640502_msg0012
rows.name:
I have predicted the outcome. I see
no need to go through with this.

rows.label: qst640502_msg0013
rows.name:
Imagining is nothing compared to seeing
the truth with your own eyes, though!
So, for the codes, we need...

rows.label: qst640502_msg0014
rows.name:
We need to take out those Stopper
Sovereigns! You won't mind if we make a
little detour for that, will you, Driver?
